item.title: Moonit, launched in collaboration with 9GAG, Memeland, and others, introduces a Meme Coin Market.
item.description: On July 31st, Moonit launched the Meme Currency Market, an AI protocol capable of automatically tokenizing internet culture and viral memes. This project was jointly established by 9GAG, Memeland, Helio Pay, MoonPay, Dexscreener, and collaborated with technology providers like Jupiter Exchange and Meteora. The platform is now officially in operation.

item.title: NAVI Team Carl: The average survival period of an AI Content Token is 5 to 6 months, and its ultimate survival depends on actual use case.
item.description: On July 31st, Carl, the business director of NAVI Protocol, who was a guest on BlockBeats' "Content Coin: Hype, Hope, or the Second Spring of Creator Economy?" themed Space, stated that from 2023 to 2024, the average lifespan of all AI concept projects is only approximately 5 to 6 months. AI content tokens are prone to being hyped, but in order to survive in the long term, they need to be provided with a use case. The question of whether AI content has value ultimately depends on how to add more functionality to the AI token itself, and real-world use cases are a way out for AI content tokens.Ongoing Space: https://x.com/i/spaces/1vAxRDOWWqkGl

item.title: Tether Releases Q2 Financial Report: U.S. Treasury Holdings Exceed $127 Billion, Net Profit Reaches $4.9 Billion
item.description: On July 31st, Tether issued its Q2 2025 financial report. The report shows that by June 30, 2025, the circulating supply of Tether (USDT) had reached more than $157 billion, with a $20 billion increase since the start of the year.The financial report discloses that Tether holds a total of $127 billion in U.S. Treasury bonds. $105.5 billion is held directly and $21.3 billion is held indirectly, representing an approximately $8 billion increase from the first quarter. The company achieved a net profit of $4.9 billion in the second quarter, and the total profit in the first half of 2025 was $5.7 billion, including an operating profit of $3.1 billion.

item.title: 「BNB Version of MicroStrategy」 VAPE Plunges Further to 13.69%
item.description: On July 31st, based on the market data from RockFlow, the "BNB Version Micro Strategy" of the US stock CEA Industries (VAPE) saw its decline expand to 13.69%, and it is now trading at $30.63.

item.title: Cryptocurrency and AI Researcher Wang Chao: Content Tokens should be explored, but the success rate of highly speculative tokens is questionable
item.description: July 31st, Cryptocurrency and AI researcher Wang Chao, as a guest on BlockBeats' "Content Coin: Hype, Hope, or Second Spring of Creator Economy?" themed Space, expressed his viewpoints. He stated that some AI-generated content is undoubtedly valuable. Nevertheless, the value of packaging AI-generated content into tokens remains questionable and depends on whether the generated content is valuable. All data itself has asset attributes, but this value is difficult to measure within the traditional price system. It is not denied that content tokens should be explored, and some content tokens are valuable. However, there is a strong doubt regarding the probability of success for a highly speculative token.Ongoing Space: https://x.com/i/spaces/1vAxRDOWWqkGl

item.title: Trump's Son Holds American Bitcoin Shares Worth Up to $367 Million
item.description: On July 31st, as per Bloomberg, Eric Trump, the son of former President Donald Trump, possesses a considerable amount of stock in American Bitcoin. He co-founded this company with others in March of this year. According to the securities filings submitted on Tuesday, his stake is set to convert into approximately 367 million new shares of the Nasdaq-listed company Gryphon Digital Mining Inc. The stock price of Gryphon on Thursday was around $1. When the merged company, which will be renamed American Bitcoin, is listed in the coming weeks, his holdings could be valued at $3.67 billion.

item.title: TACEO Completes $5.5M Seed Round Funding, with a16z CSX Participation
item.description: July 31st. The cryptocurrency data company TACEO concluded a $5.5 million seed round of financing. The financing was led by Archetype VC and was participated in by a16z CSX, Cyber.Fund, a_capital, and Polymorphic Capital. This round of funding will expedite the launch of TACEO's innovative data infrastructure product, "Private Shared State". This product enables collaborative computation, validation, and updating of encrypted data sets without the necessity of a trusted central authority or the exposure of data.

item.title: Tako Founder Edison: The purpose of Content Coin bringing traffic is to build consensus, and consensus building is what brings Holder.
item.description: On July 31st, Edison, the founder of Tako Protocol, who was a guest on BlockBeats' "Content Coin: Hype, Hope, or Creator Economy Revival?" themed Space, stated that content coin is the hope to drive traffic by means of content creation, and then tokenize the traffic through content. Traffic and attention are the sole values of content tokens. The ultimate goal of bringing traffic through content coins is to achieve consensus. Traffic is merely the foundation of consensus, and the consensus aggregation of users brings Holder.Ongoing Space: https://x.com/i/spaces/1vAxRDOWWqkGl

item.title: Deloitte: 99% of CFOs Plan to Adopt Cryptocurrency in the Long Term, with 23% Expecting to Adopt Within Two Years
item.description: On July 31st, as per the report by Cointelegraph, based on Deloitte's Q2 2025 survey of Chief Financial Officers (CFOs), cryptocurrency is emerging as a priority in corporate financial planning. A whopping 99% of CFOs from billion-dollar-level enterprises anticipate incorporating it into their business scenarios in the long run.This survey encompassed 200 CFOs of enterprises with an annual revenue exceeding $1 billion, and 23% of them expect their finance departments to utilize cryptocurrency for investment or payment within the next two years. In enterprises with an annual revenue over $10 billion, this proportion is nearly 40%.Although there is a strong adoption trend, financial executives remain vigilant. Price volatility stands as the primary hurdle in adopting non-stablecoin, with 43% of the respondents citing it as a major concern. Other significant concerns include complex accounting treatment (42%) and regulatory uncertainty (40%), and the latter is particularly prominent d

item.title: Liu Feng: Pump.Fun is no longer just a Meme issuance platform; Meme creation is also a form of content creation.
item.description: On July 31st, Liu Feng, a partner at BODL Ventures, as a guest on BlockBeats' themed Space titled "Content Coin: Hype, Hope, or the Second Spring of the Creator Economy?", stated that he did not clearly sense the distinct boundary between Meme coins and content coins. Today, Pump.Fun is no longer merely a Meme issuance platform. Many people have a fondness for it, and those who love Pump.Fun will bestow upon it countless different stories and interpretations. A more prevalent interpretation is that Pump.Fun is actually a live streaming platform, a news platform, and more significantly, a platform for creating socially trending content. This kind of meme token that motivates everyone to create is actually a type of content coin.Space in progress: https://x.com/i/spaces/1vAxRDOWWqkGl
